title: Frazer Auto Dealer Software
description: Frazer provides independent used car dealers with a high-quality, easy-to-use dealer management system at an affordable price. The Frazer DMS supports all types of retail transactions, including Cash, Finance, and Buy Here Pay Here, and includes a database of over 70,000 forms. Plus inventory management, a full accounting suite, over 200 finance and marketing integrations, and unlimited customer service - all included at the price of just $75 per month.
